General.Name: Pacific CMA Inc
General.Description: Pacific CMA, Inc., through its subsidiaries, provides supply chain management solutions, contract logistics services, and international freight forwarding services. The company operates through two segments, Air Forwarding and Sea Forwarding. It primarily handles the air and ocean import shipments from the Far East and Southwest Asia to the U.S., as well as between Hong Kong and mainland China. The company is based in Jamaica, New York.
General.Address: 153-04, Rockaway Boulevard, Jamaica, NY, United States, 11434
